item.title: Hackolaus #2: Hack for Good
item.description:
Hello, 世界! We would like to invite you to a special hackathon event this year: Hackolaus #2.
When the nights get longer and the weather outside is frightful, we need some warmth in our hearts. Many people sacrifice their time and energy to create this warmth by giving and contributing to the benefit of those less fortunate and in need. Many NGOs, associations and individuals also work hard to give to social, environmental or other sustainability causes.
